unnormalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore: Your Dream Home in Mumbai Just Got Closer!**
normalised: **Home Loan Schemes Galore: Your Dream Home in Mumbai Just Got Closer!**

unnormalised: Looking to finally buy that flat in Bandra you've always dreamed of? Good news! Several banks are rolling out some sweet home loan schemes right now. Think low interest rates and flexible repayment options – perfect for the average Sharmaji struggling to make ends meet.
normalised: Looking to finally buy that flat in Bandra you've always dreamed of? Good news! Several banks are rolling out some sweet home loan schemes right now. Think low interest rates and flexible repayment options – perfect for the average Sharmaji struggling to make ends meet.

unnormalised: HDFC is advertising special Diwali offers valid until 31/10/2024, with rates starting at just 8.5%. SBI is not far behind either, with a "Griha Pravesh" scheme promising quick approvals before 17/11/2024. Plus, PNB Housing Finance is hosting a virtual webinar on 27/09/2024 at 11:00 hrs to explain all the fine print – no more confusing jargon!
normalised: H D F C is advertising special Diwali offers valid until thirty first October two thousand and twenty four, with rates starting at just eight point five percent. S B I is not far behind either, with a "Griha Pravesh" scheme promising quick approvals before seventeenth November two thousand and twenty four. Plus, P N B Housing Finance is hosting a virtual webinar on twenty seventh September two thousand and twenty four at eleven zero zero hours to explain all the fine print – no more confusing jargon!

unnormalised: Remember that 90% loan-to-value ratio is now a norm. You only need to shell out a small down payment. Also, check for government-backed schemes like the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana for even more benefits, especially if you're buying your first home. Don't wait! Get those documents ready.
